definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
"walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]

sentences.english: Magda, this is my friend, Katie.
sentences.chinese: 麥格達，這是我的朋友凱蒂。

sentences.english: It's a good idea to use two of the same model with the overheads.
sentences.chinese: 用兩支和OH麥相同型號的麥克是一個不錯的主意。

sentences.english: Washed by rain, the wheat field and grape trellises in front of the door beautifully shimmered with brilliant yellow and tender green.
sentences.chinese: 門前的麥壠和葡萄架子，都濯得新黃嫩綠的非常鮮麗。

sentences.english: Tea mixed with other wheat cereals, wheat has a dove, we called APF meters.
sentences.chinese: 麥茶與其他穀類混合，有一種鳩麥，我們叫薏仁米。

sentences.english: This is an area where dynamics and condensers are used about equally.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個動圈麥和電容麥差不多都同被使用到的區域。

sentences.english: I'd like a Fillet-o-Fish and an apple pie.
sentences.chinese: 我要一個麥香魚和一個蘋果派。

sentences.english: I consider myself lucky to know Uncle Melrose.
sentences.chinese: 認識麥羅斯叔叔我覺得自已很幸運。

sentences.english: You're a student too, Magda. How do you manage?
sentences.chinese: 麥格達，你也是學生，你是怎麼應對這些問題的呢？

sentences.english: McDull has to go to Wudang Mountain to study taijiquan.
sentences.chinese: 而悲慘的麥兜卻要到武當山上學太極。

sentences.english: Mrs. Bennet and Lydia are going in the carriage to Meryton.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽和麗迪雅乘着馬車到麥裏屯去了。

sentences.english: No; he never saw him till the other morning at Meryton.
sentences.chinese: 不認識，那天上午在麥裏屯他還是初次和他見面。

sentences.english: McGill believes the city's expansion bodes ill.
sentences.chinese: 麥基爾認爲，該城市的擴張前景堪憂。

sentences.english: In fact, Mr Malkiel is, overall, very bullish.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，麥基爾總體而言非常樂觀。

sentences.english: But I wouldn`t want him to ever grow up in the cartoons.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我從沒想過要讓麥兜在漫畫中長大。

sentences.english: Michael bases apply to all personnel mud plant.
sentences.chinese: 適用於麥基地泥漿廠所有人員。

definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
